Detailed Description

micro.4 external flash

Micro.4 external flash: support function headers.

Define Documentation

#define FLASH_SR_BP0   0x04
 

Block protect bit 0

#define FLASH_SR_BP1   0x08
 

Block protect bit 1

#define FLASH_SR_BP2   0x10
 

Block protect bit 2

#define FLASH_SR_SRWD   0x80
 

Flash status register bits Status register write protect

#define FLASH_SR_WEL   0x02
 

Write enable latch

#define FLASH_SR_WIP   0x01
 

Write in progress (busy)

Function Documentation

portCHAR flash_erase_sector (  uint32_t  address  ) 
 

Flash sector erase. Sector size is 64 kilobytes. Address must point at start of sector.

Parameters:
address block address on flash
Returns:
pdTRUE

pdFALSE bus not free or address not valid (must be at start of sector)

portCHAR flash_read (  uint32_t  address,
uint8_t *  buffer,
uint16_t  length
) 
 

Read flash block.

Parameters:
address block address on flash
buffer pointer to buffer
length length of read buffer
Returns:
pdTRUE

pdFALSE bus not free or init failed

int16_t flash_signature_read (  void   ) 
 

Flash signature read. Wakes the device up from power down mode. Signature value should be 0x12 if the flash is present and working.

Returns:
signature value

-1 bus not free

int16_t flash_status_read (  void   ) 
 

Flash status read.

Returns:
status register value

-1 bus not free

portCHAR flash_write (  uint32_t  address,
uint8_t *  buffer,
uint16_t  length
) 
 

Write flash page. Page size is 256 bytes. Write address must point at start of page.

Parameters:
address block address on flash
buffer pointer to buffer
length length of read buffer
Returns:
pdTRUE

pdFALSE bus not free or address not valid (must be at start of page)

portCHAR flash_write_wait (  void   ) 
 

Wait flash operation to complete.

Returns:
pdTRUE

pdFALSE bus not free
